HiddenText.Name: CE evening school Q12
HiddenText.OpenningText: Can I register for Continuing Education Evening School credit classes if I am on-track?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Continuing Education Evening School credit classes are reserved for community members and students who are off-track. However, most Continuing Education Evening School classes allow a limited number of on-track students to enroll.Â  These sections will be listed on the MY.BYUI.EDU registration page.
